entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of ice pellets mixed with light snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
